channel.title: [VFM] Poisonous Mafia - (3/17) - Completed
channel.description:
# [color=green]Welcome to Poisonous Mafia![/color] Hosted by Luxy Co-Hosted by @Geyde
# [color=green]Rules:[/color] https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926?u=luxy
# [color=green]Gameplay:[/color]
Days last 48 hours and nights last 24 hours. The mafia will communicate via a private DM on the forums. The mafia has an unassigned factional kill per night. Lynches are majority only. A minimum of ten posts with content every 24 hours is required. If you do not meet this requirement you will be replaced out after one warning. Players who are poisoned are announced at the start of the day after the night that the poisoner targetted them, and will die by the end of the day. Both poisoners can choose either to real poison, or fake poison, anyone including themselves. The Healer may choose one target per day to cure of their poison. The healer cannot target themself. The backup poisoners are not informed that they are backup poisoners until their team's poisoner has died. They will believe they are a vanilla town or mafia goon until the poisoner on their team dies. The backup poisoners are flipped at VT/Goon if they die before the Poisoners and the rolecop checks the backup poisoner as VT. Real and Fake poisons are both announced SoD, but only players who are real poisoned will die if not healed.
# [color=green]Rolecards:[/color]
> # [color=green]Vanilla Town[/color] > > You have no abilities except for your voice and your vote. Put them to good use! *You win when the mafia have been eliminated.*
> # [color=green]Town Poisoner[/color] > > Once per night, you may target a player to either real poison or fake poison. At the start of the coming day it will be announced who was poisoned the night before and players who are poisoned will die at the end of the day. *You win when the mafia have been eliminated.*
> # [color=green]Town Healer[/color] > > Once per day, you may select a player, other than yourself, to cure of their poison. This prevents their death due to poison at the end of the day. *You win when the mafia have been eliminated.*
> # [color=green]Town Cop[/color] > > Once per night you may investigate a player, revealing whether they are a member of the mafia or not. *You win when the mafia have been eliminated.*
> # [color=green]Town Backup Poisoner[/color] > > When the **Town Poisoner** dies, you will gain their rolecard. The player assigned this rolecard will be given a **Vanilla Town** rolecard. *You win when the mafia have been eliminated.*
> # [color=red]Mafia Goon[/color] > > You have no night abilities, however, you share a private chat and a factional kill with your teammates. *You win when the town has been eliminated.*
> # [color=red]Mafia Poisoner[/color] > > Once per night, you may target a player to either real poison or fake poison. At the start of the coming day it will be announced who was poisoned the night before and players who are poisoned will die at the end of the day. *You win when the town has been eliminated.*
> # [color=red]Mafia Rolecop[/color] > > Once per night, you may investigate a player, revealing their rolecard to you at the start of the next day. *You win when the town has been eliminated.*
> # [color=red]Mafia Backup Poisoner[/color] > > When the **Mafia Poisoner** dies, you will gain their rolecard. The player assigned this rolecard will be given a **Mafia Goon** rolecard. *You win when the town has been eliminated.*
# [color=green]Rolelist:[/color] **[color=green]Town Poisoner Town Cop Town Healer Town Backup Poisoner Vanilla Town Vanilla Town Vanilla Town Vanilla Town Vanilla Town Vanilla Town Vanilla Town Vanilla Town Vanilla Town[/color]** **[color=red]Mafia Poisoner Mafia Rolecop Mafia Backup Poisoner Mafia Goon[/color]**
# [color=green]Players:[/color]
1. sulit 2. ~~eevee~~ - [color=red]Lynched D2[/color] - [color=red]Mafia Goon[/color] 3. Napoleon 4. Alice 5. Marshal 6. Vulgard 7. Arete 8. ~~DatBird~~ - [color=red]Killed N2[/color] - [color=green]Town Cop[/color] 9. ~~Andrej~~ ~~N.1~~ - [color=red]Killed D2[/color] - [color=green]Vanilla Town[/color] 10. SirDerpsALot 11. ~~Appelsini~~ - [color=red]Killed N1[/color] - [color=green]Town Healer[/color] 12. Hippolytus 13. CRichard564 14. PoisonedSquid 15. Italy 16. ~~Amelia~~ - [color=red]Lynched D1[/color] - [color=red]Mafia Goon[/color] 17. Emilia
# [color=green]Backups:[/color]
1. N.1 2. Possessed
# [color=green]Useful Links:[/color]
[SoD1: Apples to Apples](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/vfm-poisonous-mafia-17-17-day-1-apples-to-apples/80690/495?u=luxy) [EoD1: Amelia is Lynched](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/vfm-poisonous-mafia-17-17-day-1-apples-to-apples/80690/3670?u=luxy) [SoD2: Appelsiini was Killed](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/vfm-poisonous-mafia-16-17-night-1-quick-demise/80690/3675?u=luxy) [EoD2: eevee is lynched and N.1 dies](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/vfm-poisonous-mafia-15-17-day-2-n-1-has-corona/80690/5089?u=luxy) [SoD3: DatBird was Killed](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/vfm-poisonous-mafia-13-17-night-2-eevee-can-no-longer-evolve/80690/5091?u=luxy)

item.title: [VFM] Poisonous Mafia - (3/17) - Completed
item.dc:creator: CRichard564
item.description:
Indeed saying they were all mafia for pushing me wasn’t the best argument. In all probability, not all mafia would vote a townie up for distancing purposes.

Read full topic

item.title: [VFM] Poisonous Mafia - (3/17) - Completed
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
You were right but you need to provide your thought processes behind your observations or theories. The more detailed you can lay out your thoughts explaining your reads the easier it is too see you are a village.

You often didn’t clearly explain enough of your observations (you did sometimes with your VCA stuff) which is mostly what les to your lynch - we just didnt have quite enough to conclude you were town.

You had a lot going for you though!

Read full topic

item.title: [VFM] Poisonous Mafia - (3/17) - Completed
item.dc:creator: astand
item.description:
Vulgard:

I feel like MyLo/LyLo scenarios should be looked at in a complete vacuum
Disregard everything that happened before and look at who’s doing what.

Not a bad way to look at things.

Plus also trying to recognize when a person doesn’t really act like a wolf and being able to act on it. Hippo had a strong hunch that CRich wasn’t wolfy, but wasn’t able to overcome the picture in his mind. (for example). And similar thing happens very, very often.

Read full topic

item.title: [VFM] Poisonous Mafia - (3/17) - Completed
item.dc:creator: Vulgard
item.description:
Vulgard:

Disregard everything that happened before and look at who’s doing what.

if every villager alive on the last day could do that then they would probably notice how Marshal was trying to get the game to end and didn’t really seem interested/invested in the lynch
but it’s having that perspective which is so difficult to get to. i didn’t have it until I was told in deadchat Marshal was a wolf and then I could see it

Read full topic

item.title: [VFM] Poisonous Mafia - (3/17) - Completed
item.dc:creator: Vulgard
item.description:
Arete:

I really appreciate your attempts to clear yourself on the last day,

yeah no, Hippo was super villagery this game.
I feel like MyLo/LyLo scenarios should be looked at in a complete vacuum
Disregard everything that happened before and look at who’s doing what.
The problem is that it’s hard to do that without an outsider perspective (like a spectator’s), because you get lingering influence like “that guy was towncore” or “i’m ride or die with that one”

Read full topic
